publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-206 Maureen Macmillan: The Parliament's In-house Mail Services—That the Parliament welcomes the recent announcement that its in-house mail services will be transferred to the responsibility of the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body (SPCB); congratulates all members of the Royal Mail staff for the professional service they have provided to MSPs and staff since 1999, and urges the SPCB to consider improving the terms and conditions of employment for the current Royal Mail staff based in the Parliament. Supported by: Roseanna Cunningham*, Christine May*, Brian Adam*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Ms Wendy Alexander*
